Ext.ux.FlashControl - Examples

Two window example

Shows an example using two windows - the Flash Movie's container is the window itself. The Flash Movie can change its position within them. View example...

Nested Panel example

Shows an example using one window with border-layout- the Flash Movie sits within an Ext.Panel (part of border-layout's region) and can switch change its position. View example...

"autoAddListeners" example

Just like the "Two window example", but this time we will use the "autoAddListeners" configuration property along with custom listeners. View example...
